Recovery Resources

Access tools, guides, and information to support your recovery journey. Our curated resources are designed to help you build a strong foundation for lasting sobriety.

Resource Categories

Educational Materials

Articles, guides, and videos about addiction and recovery

Support Groups

Information on AA, NA, SMART Recovery, and other support communities

Recovery Events

Workshops, meetings, and social gatherings for the recovery community

Local Services

Treatment centers, counselors, and other recovery services in San Diego

Employment Resources

Job listings, resume help, and career guidance for those in recovery

Wellness Tools

Resources for physical health, nutrition, and exercise in recovery

Mental Health

Resources for managing anxiety, depression, and other mental health concerns

Nutrition & Recovery

Guides for healthy eating and nutrition to support recovery

Nutrition for Recovery: Healing Your Body

Need Personalized Support?

Our recovery specialists are available to help you find the right resources for your specific situation.

Contact Our Team
Elm Recovery

Providing safe, supportive housing for individuals on their path to lasting recovery in San Diego, California.
